function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Cross-contamination risk due to inadequate hvac systems","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in closed buildings, leading to poor air circulation and increased transmission of infectious diseases.","category":"Lack of
